name: Until Sunset (Дожить до заката)
description:
Vampires have been living on Earth for a very long time. And throughout their lives, people have tried to expel them, destroy their homes and put vampires on a stake. However, one brave vampire did not give up and has been guarding his home for many centuries.

Until Sunset is a two-dimensional Tower Defense strategy with Action elements. You don't play as a typical hero, but as a vampire antagonist who defends himself from people.

  A team of 8 people worked on this game. The graphic and musical design is original.
